recipe_card: Cheesy Buffalo Chicken Dip 237 Ratings

recipe_ingredients: [{"recipe_ingredients":"2  bone-in chicken breast halves"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 teaspoon olive oil"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 stalk celery, finely diced"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 (8 ounce) package reduced-fat cream cheese"},{"recipe_ingredients":"¾ cup blue cheese dressing"},{"recipe_ingredients":"¾ cup ranch dressing"},{"recipe_ingredients":"⅓ cup hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®)"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese"}]
recipe_directions: [{"recipe_directions":"Place chicken breasts in a large saucepan; cover with water. Bring to a boil and cook until no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 20 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center of a breast should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). Drain and allow chicken to cool enough to handle. Pull meat from bones and skin. Shred meat and set aside."},{"recipe_directions":"Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."},{"recipe_directions":"Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Cook and stir celery in hot oil until soft. Mix in cream cheese, blue cheese dressing, and ranch dressing. Cook and stir until smooth and creamy. Stir in shredded chicken and hot sauce. Transfer to an 8x8-inch baking dish and sprinkle with shredded cheese."},{"recipe_directions":"Bake in the preheated oven until golden and bubbly, about 30 minutes."}]

recipe_card: Simple Artichoke Dip 207 Ratings
recipe_tags: [{"recipe_tags":"Appetizers and Snacks"},{"recipe_tags":"Dips and Spreads Recipes"},{"recipe_tags":"Artichoke Dip Recipes"}]
recipe_ingredients: [{"recipe_ingredients":"1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 cup mayonnaise"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 cup grated Parmesan cheese"}]
recipe_directions: [{"recipe_directions":"Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."},{"recipe_directions":"Mix artichoke hearts, mayonnaise, and Parmesan cheese together in a bowl until well combined. Spread mixture in a 9x13-inch baking dish."},{"recipe_directions":"Bake in the preheated oven until bubbly and golden brown, about 15 to 20 minutes."}]
